metadata.Title: CVE-2020-22283 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: A buffer overflow vulnerability in the icmp6_send_response_with_addrs_and_netif() function of Free Software Foundation lwIP version git head allows attackers to access sensitive information via a crafted ICMPv6 packet.

criterions.comment: lwip package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
